price: 78 C’est Lui qui vous a dotés de l’ouïe, de la vue et de l’entendement. Mais vous êtes si peu reconnaissants.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī ansha-a lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
